item.title: First Post
item.description:
Hello, this is my first tech blog created with Hugo + GitHub Pages

‘‘‘bash echo “Hello, world!”

241 git –version 242 git update 243 git –help 244 git -U 245 hugo version 246 brew install hugo 247 hugo new site cblog 248 ls 249 pwd 250 cd cblog 251 ls -la 252 git init 253 cd /Users/choi 254 cd cblog 255 ls -la 256 git submodule add https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod theme/PaperMod 257 vi hugo.toml 258 hugo new posts/first-post.md 259 ls 260 hugo new content/posts/first-post.md 261 cd /cblog 262 ls themes 263 ls 264 cd theme 265 ls- la 266 ls 267 cd ../ 268 rm -rf theme 269 git submodule add https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod themes/PaperMod 270 hugo new posts/first-post.md 271 vi contents/posts/first-post.md 272 ls contents/posts 273 ls 274 cd content 275 ls- la 276 ls -la 277 cd posts 278 ls -la 279 cd ../ 280 ls -la 281 cd posts 282 ls -la 283 vi first-post.md 284 hugo server -D 285 pwd 286 cd ../../ 287 pwd 288 hugo server -D 289 cat content/posts/first-post.md 290 vi content/posts/first-post.md 291 ls 292 cd public 293 ls 294 cd ../ 295 hugo -t PaperMod 296 cd public 297 ls 298 ls -l 299 git init 300 git add . 301 git commit -m “first deploy” 302 git branch -M main 303 git remote add origin
